descripcion.titulo: Get the best technical support on the market.
descripcion.texto: With our technical service you will never have to worry again with a computer incidence.

diferencias.titulo: How do we differ from the rest?
diferencias.descripcion: We give responses to different sectors, and adapt ourself to the needs of your company, with a high quality and fast response thanks to our technicians, in remote or face-to-face.
diferencias.soporte-descripcion: Our professionals are certified in a wide range of modern technologies and current software, with which they can help you with your problems.
diferencias.entorno-descripcion: Our technicians will receive specific training for the sector to which your business belongs, for a faster resolution of incidents.
diferencias.solucion-titulo: The solution at the click of a button
diferencias.solucion-descripcion: With our technical support application, you will have quick communication and resolution to your incidents, almost in real-time!

opiniones.souleima: ¨Since we hired the service of SINGETEC we haven't had any computer problems, the technicians are fast and efficient.¨
opiniones.maria: ¨The ticket system in the application is wonderful, completely adapted to my company, I recommend it.¨
opiniones.aurelio: ¨I have a company in the construction sector, without any knowledge of computers, the guys at SINGETEC have solved all the doubts I had and I ended up hiring their service¨
opiniones.cayetana: ¨I inherited my father's company and had no idea how the entire system worked, the guys at SINGETEC have saved my life.¨

nosotros.oscar: Responsible for ensuring cybersecurity at SINGETEC. Information Security Director. In charge of protecting information.
nosotros.jorge: Leader of the technology and engineering department. Responsible for developing policies and procedures to improve products and services for external clients.
nosotros.david: Responsible for the systems and information technologies of the company, responsible for identifying and providing the necessary technologies for SINGETEC processes to function as best as possible.

planes.premium-descripcion: Hire our online remote technical support service and we will solve all your incidents during your company's business hours using GLPI.
planes.full-descripcion: You will get 24-hour technical support service for any type of computer incident, as well as phone consultations in case of doubts, without the need to use our GLPI platform.
planes.full-final: The most selected by our users
